name: A boat to clean the Ocean
name_original: A boat to clean the Ocean
description:
A boat to clean the ocean is a little arcade game in which you control
a boat to collect trash that is menacing the clean island.

Donations (if any)

 If you donate I will take a 20% cut on your donation for me and I will give the last 80% to #teamseas

(Prefer to give on the #teamseas official website if you don't want to give me money)

Controls and informations LEFT/RIGHTDirectionsUP/DOWNSpeed (gas)

The  (on) or  (off) allow or disallow anonymous metrics.
What is collected > Time when you are connected and IPs
more informations on anonymous metrics at GDevelop wiki
